category: Stages and Roles in Textual Publication
explanation: Manuscript, Editor, Publisher, and Proofreader are all primarily concerned with the written text, its creation, refinement, and distribution. An Illustrator, however, creates visual content rather than textual content, making it the odd one out in this group focused on text-based publication.

tokens: French Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen
explanation: Magna Carta, the US Declaration of Independence, the French Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen, and the UN Charter are all historical documents that serve as foundational legal texts or declarations of rights for a state or international body. 'The Prince' is a political treatise offering advice on acquiring and maintaining power, not a foundational legal document or charter.
SOCKS, GLOVES, SHOES, and EARRINGS are all items typically worn in sets of two. A SCARF is generally worn as a single item.
